Private Litigation Case Title: Dege et al v. Hutchinson Technology, Inc
Notes: The settlement agreement did not state a total cost but the company stated in an SEC filing that it had record a charge of $2,003,000.

Description: The Wisconsin Attorney General obtained a court judgment requiring Hutchinson Technology to pay $95,000 in forfeitures and court costs for violations of its Wisconsin air pollution control permit and Wisconsin's air pollution laws.

Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on October 14, 2020 in response to an open records request.

NAICS Translation: 332311: Prefabricated Metal Building and Component Manufacturing
